overview_of_class: The course introduces teaching and learning strategies that aid course participants in becoming effective educators in elementary and secondary school settings. Emphasizing current research, the course is a comprehensive study of teaching methods in world languages. Lesson and unit planning and assessment of student learning are elements of the seminar.
name: Methods & Techniques: World Languages
title: SESP MS_ED 455-0-20 Methods & Techniques: World Languages

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The course introduces teaching and learning strategies that aid course participants in becoming effective educators in elementary and secondary school settings. Emphasizing current research, the course is a comprehensive study of teaching methods in world languages. Lesson and unit planning and assessment of student learning are elements of the seminar.
